titleStmt.title: The practice of meditating with profit The misteries of our Lord, the Blessed Vergin & saints. Gathered out of diuers good authors, and published by the very Reuerend Master Iohn Alberto Buronzo, chanon of the cathedral church of Verselles. Reuiued and augmented by the same author, & translated into English by a Father of the Societie of Iesus.
titleStmt.author: Berzetti, Nicolas.

titleStmt.title: The practice of meditating with profit The misteries of our Lord, the Blessed Vergin & saints. Gathered out of diuers good authors, and published by the very Reuerend Master Iohn Alberto Buronzo, chanon of the cathedral church of Verselles. Reuiued and augmented by the same author, & translated into English by a Father of the Societie of Iesus.
titleStmt.author: Berzetti, Nicolas.
Talbot, Thomas, 1572-1652.

notesStmt.note: John Alberto Buronzo = Nicolas Berzetti; Father of the Societie of Jesus = Thomas Talbot.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
